title: Model list sync
description: Automatically synchronize model lists for all channels in your managed site, ensuring consistency with upstream

settings.title: Model List Sync Settings
settings.enableDesc: Automatically sync model lists at specified intervals
settings.concurrencyDesc: Number of channels to process in parallel (recommend 1-3 to avoid rate limits)
settings.maxRetriesDesc: Maximum automatic retry attempts on failure
settings.requestsPerMinuteDesc: Rate limit: maximum number of requests per minute (recommend 10-30)
settings.burstDesc: Token bucket size: allowed burst requests before throttling
settings.allowedModelsDesc: Optional allow-list. Leave empty to sync all upstream models.
settings.allowedModelsPlaceholder: Search and select models, or type to add custom
settings.allowedModelsHint: Only models listed here will be written to each channel during sync.
settings.globalChannelModelFiltersDesc: Include/exclude rules applied to all channels before per-channel filters.
settings.globalChannelModelFiltersDialogSubtitle: Rules defined here apply to every channel before its own channel-specific filters.
settings.viewExecutionDesc: View detailed execution results and trigger manual syncs

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by channel name, ID, or error message...

manual.description: Choose channels below to trigger a one-off sync. Selections are not saved.
manual.searchPlaceholder: Search channels by name or ID...

empty.title: No channels available
empty.description: Refresh the list or adjust your filters to find channels.

empty.noDataDesc: Click "Run All" to start synchronizing all channels
empty.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your filters or search query
empty.configWarningDesc: Please configure your managed site base URL, admin token, and user ID before running model list sync

error.configMissing: Please configure managed site settings first
error.noSelection: Please select at least one channel
